Setting.ReadIEMDescribe: It is not possible to test whether all IEMs in the world are compatible.\nIf an error is reported when you input with IEM, select this option.
Setting.DeveloperReadme: ZeroBitCode is a developer who loves original games.\n\n<color=#6e6e6e>Click to go to the website for more information</color>
Setting.AutoRevertWindowSetting: Is resolution OK?\nSettings will auto-revert if not confirmed in time
License.Title: License Dialog
LicenseDialog.Title: License Dialog
GameLevelDialog.AddAndUploadYourTask: Add a new chapter where you can make regular questions \nand share them with other players as mods!
RegexDialog.ResultAnnotaiton: The match you get using the regex you entered is as follows.\n<color=#6EC67D>Green means that the output is in line with expectations</color>, <color=#C06671> red means the output is incorrect</color>.
RegexHint._z: Only the end of the string or before the end of the line break
RegexHint.CountNM: Match between n and m times {n,m}
EditorDialog.CreateOrSelectTask: Create or select a task that already exists
EditorDialog.Legal:
Before uploading your data and showing it to other players, you agree to the Steam Workshop Legal Agreement (link below)
and promise not to upload content that violates laws and regulations or is unpleasant to others.
Until you agree to the Steam Workshop Legal Agreement, Workshop items will be hidden by default.
By uploading data, you agree to the Workshop Legal Agreement.
EditorDialog.TranslateAgrementContent: You agree that this game developer (ZeroBitCode) will send your edited content to a third party in exchange for a multilingual translation.
UploadDialog.Operator: What was the action before the error?
UploadDialog.Title: There is an error in the game
UploadDialog.BeforeSendTip: Click to send error report to developer.\nThank you!
ConvertEncodeDialog.Title: Converted Encoding
Leaderboard.RegexMaster.Title: Regex Master
Leaderboard.MuyuMerit.Title: Muyu Merit
Leaderboard.RegexWord.Title: Regex Word
Guide.Chapter1_1_A: This section displays the <color=#e06600>new knowledge points</color> and <color=#e06600>question descriptions</color>.
Guide.Chapter1_1_B: The area shows <color=#e06600>test cases</color>\n<color=#e06600>Click expand</color> to view expected matches.
Guide.Chapter1_1_B.Fold: The number of expected matching\nresults for this test case is displayed below.\nClick to expand.
Guide.Chapter1_1_C: In this text, enter the <color=#e06600>regular expression</color> that meets your requirements, then click the <color=#e06600>Submit</color> button.
Guide.ResultPage_A: This area displays the <color=#e06600>regular expression</color> you input. An error message will appear here if there are parameters.
Guide.ResultPage_B: This section displays the <color=#e06600>test case matching results</color>, <color=#4EC65D>with green indicating correct matches</color> and <color=#C04651>red showing incorrect ones</color>.\nClick on the expand button to view detailed matching information.
Guide.ResultPage_C: ← Click on the tab to go back to the previous page and re-answer.
Guide.Chapter2_5_A: Click the button to display the string escape result\n<color=#e06600>to make the invisible characters visible</color>
Guide.Game_RegexWord_A: Some letters gradually appear on the grids.\nLeft-click the letters to move their positions.
Guide.Game_RegexWord_B: Arrange special patterns to get corresponding scores.
Guide.Game_Ninja_A: At the bottom of the screen is the <color=#e06600>regular expression currently in use</color> and the player's <color=#e06600>health</color>
Guide.Game_Ninja_B: Some strings appear at regular intervals.\n<color=#e06600>Hold down the left mouse button</color> and cross out the strings that match the regular expression <color=#e06600></color>
Guide.Game_Ninja_C: If you erase <color=#e06600>unmatched</color> strings or <color=#e06600>missed matches</color>, deduct the player's life value.
Guide.Game_PasswordHint_A: Game developer forgot their game account password!\n<color=#e06600>According to the password reset instructions!</color> Please help them reset it immediately.
Guide.Game_WoodenFish_A: <color=#e06600>Left-click</color> on the wooden fish to increase the success rate
Guide.Game_WoodenFish_B: <color=#e06600> right-click to</color> switch to other wooden fish skins

RegexWordDialog.RandomCount: The higher the score, the faster new characters will appear
PasswordHintDIalog.Guide: Follow the prompts to create a new password
PasswordHintDialog.Data.1: There is a limit to the length of the password
PasswordHintDialog.Data.4: Numbers must not be followed by letters
PasswordHintDialog.Data.5: The 8th digit must be a space character
PasswordHintDialog.Data.6: Non-word characters must be followed by a space character
PasswordHintDialog.Data.7: The adjacent spaces must not be greater than 8
PasswordHintDialog.Data.9: The numeric portion involving the approximate value of Pi.
PasswordHintDialog.Data.10: Numbers that appear to be phone numbers must not appear
PasswordHintDialog.Data.11: Content with suspicious addresses must not appear
PasswordHintDialog.Data.13: The new password must not be the same as the old password
